---
id: stream-progress
title: "Stream progress events"
description: "Server-Sent Events stream for real-time progress updates. This endpoint establishes an SSE connection to receive progress updates for various operations like watchlist syncing, delete sync analysis, etc."

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/progress/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Server-Sent Events stream for real-time progress updates. This endpoint establishes an SSE connection to receive progress updates for various operations like watchlist syncing, delete sync analysis, etc.

  parameters={undefined}
>
